001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core;
002
003import java.util.Random;
004import java.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalRandom;
005
006import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core.config.ClimateConfig;
007import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core.factor.Factors;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector2;
009
010import static java.lang.Math.*;
011
012public final class ClimateEngine {
013    public static final String FACTOR_NOISE = "noise";
014    public static final String FACTOR_DAY_TIME = "day_time";
015
016    private final ClimateConfig config;
017    private final PerlinNoise noise;
018    private final int[] offsets = new int[2];
019
020    public ClimateEngine(ClimateConfig config, long worldSeed) {
021        this.config = config;
022        Random random = new Random(
023            config.seed() != null
024                ? config.seed()
025                : config.useWorldSeed() ? worldSeed : ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextLong()
026        );
027        for (int i = 0; i < offsets.length; i++) {
028            offsets[i] = random.nextInt(1024);
029        }
030        noise = new PerlinNoise(random);
031    }
032
033    public ClimateConfig config() { return config; }
034
035    private double noise(double day, Vector2 pos, ClimateConfig.Noise options, int offsetKey) {
036        double scale = options.scale();
037        if (scale > 0) {
038            pos = pos.divide(scale);
039        } else {
040            pos = Vector2.ZERO;
041        }
042        double offset = offsets[offsetKey];
043        return noise.get(day * options.timeFactor() + offset, pos.x() + offset, pos.y() + offset, options.octaves(), options.lacunarity(), options.persistence());
044    }
045
046    private double temperatureNoise(double day, Vector2 pos) {
047        return noise(day, pos, config.temperatureNoise(), 0);
048    }
049
050    private double humidityNoise(double day, Vector2 pos) {
051        return noise(day, pos, config.humidityNoise(), 1);
052    }
053
054    public Factors<ClimateState> state(double day, Vector2 pos) {
055        var factors = Factors.<ClimateState>builder();
056        factors.add(FACTOR_NOISE, new ClimateState(
057            temperatureNoise(day, pos), humidityNoise(day, pos), 0
058        ));
059        factors.add(FACTOR_DAY_TIME, new ClimateState(
060            sin((day * 2 * PI) - (0.5 * PI)) * config.factors().dayTimeAmplitude(), 0, 0
061        ));
062        return factors.build();
063    }
064}
